couchCoopGames.Name: Overcooked 1
couchCoopGames.Description: Fast-paced cooking game, best played with official servers or parsec/steam remote play.

couchCoopGames.Name: Overcooked 2
couchCoopGames.Description: Fast-paced cooking game, connect via official servers, or parsec/steam remote play.

couchCoopGames.Name: PICO PARK
couchCoopGames.Description: Platform puzzle game where stages require cooperation, connect via official servers or parsec/steam remote play.

onlineCoopGames.Name: Monopoly (Richup variant)
onlineCoopGames.Description: Digital version of the classic board game Monopoly, enhanced with Richup features and graphics. Game duration can vary significantly.

onlineCoopGames.Name: Tabletopia
onlineCoopGames.Description: A digital platform offering a vast collection of board games that can be played online with various filters for player requirement and playing time.

onlineCoopGames.Name: Crowdparty
onlineCoopGames.Description: A compilation of party games where the duration depends on the game chosen, typically lasting up to 15 minutes.

onlineCoopGames.Name: Obliteracers
onlineCoopGames.Description: Competitive racing game similar to Mario Kart, with game duration ranging from 3 to 10 minutes. Mixed reviews noted.

onlineCoopGames.Name: Turmoil
onlineCoopGames.Description: Strategy game focused on managing an oil drilling operation, with multiplayer coming in Q1 2022. Singleplayer sessions last 5 to 14 hours.

onlineCoopGames.Name: Codenames
onlineCoopGames.Description: Concept-identifying game, played over different screens, spymasters should mute to prevent verbal clues.

onlineCoopGames.Name: Town of Salem
onlineCoopGames.Description: Players assume roles of townsfolk or villains and must uncover each other's identities; games are played on different screens.

onlineCoopGames.Name: Among Us
onlineCoopGames.Description: Players work to prepare their spaceship for departure while rooting out impostors; game can be played across different devices.

onlineCoopGames.Name: Goose Goose Duck
onlineCoopGames.Description: Similar to Among Us but with more roles, built-in proximity voice chat, and additional mechanics.

onlineCoopGames.Name: Super Auto Pets
onlineCoopGames.Description: Team-building strategy game where players assemble teams of pets to battle against others.

onlineCoopGames.Name: Crabgame
onlineCoopGames.Description: Collection of minigames where players compete to be the last one standing.

onlineCoopGames.Name: Toribash
onlineCoopGames.Description: Physics-based fighting game where players control the movement of their fighters' muscles.

onlineCoopGames.Name: Killer Queen Black
onlineCoopGames.Description: Team-based combat game focused on either killing the opposing queen or completing strategic objectives.

onlineCoopGames.Name: Pummel Party
onlineCoopGames.Description: Party game consisting of a series of minigames where players compete against each other.

onlineCoopGames.Name: Talisman: Digital Edition
onlineCoopGames.Description: Digital version of the classic board game Talisman, where players go on quests to gain strength and conquer the crown of command.

onlineCoopGames.Name: Crawl
onlineCoopGames.Description: Dungeon crawler where players take turns being the hero and the monsters, with the aim to defeat the final boss.

onlineCoopGames.Name: Embr
onlineCoopGames.Description: Cooperative firefighting game where players work together to save people from burning buildings.

onlineCoopGames.Name: For The King
onlineCoopGames.Description: Combination of strategy, RPG, and roguelike elements where players must survive to restore their kingdom.

onlineCoopGames.Name: Just Shapes & Beats
onlineCoopGames.Description: Rhythm game where players dodge shapes synchronized to music.

onlineCoopGames.Name: Lethal League Blaze
onlineCoopGames.Description: Intense ball game where the goal is to hit your opponent with an ultra-fast ball.

onlineCoopGames.Name: Move or Die
onlineCoopGames.Description: Fast-paced party game where the mechanics change every 20 seconds.

onlineCoopGames.Name: Moving Out
onlineCoopGames.Description: Physics-based moving simulator where players move furniture under time pressure.

onlineCoopGames.Name: Rivals of Aether
onlineCoopGames.Description: Indie fighting game inspired by Super Smash Bros, focusing on elemental-based characters and dynamic fighting techniques.

onlineCoopGames.Name: Squeakers
onlineCoopGames.Description: Platformer where players must avoid touching the floor, which is treated as lava.

webGames.Name: Dashpong
webGames.Description: An upcoming ping-pong based game with unique mechanics, set to be released in 2022.

webGames.Name: Multiversus
webGames.Game Type: Platform fighting game with Warner Bros IPs
webGames.Description: A new platform fighter featuring characters from Warner Bros franchises. Expected release in 2022.

webGames.Name: Cards Against Humanity
webGames.Description: Web-based card game where players complete statements using words or phrases on cards that are typically deemed as offensive, with a PG-13+ rating for the Family Edition.

webGames.Name: Garticphone
webGames.Description: Drawing and guessing game inspired by the telephone game; played in a web browser.

webGames.Name: Wordbomb
webGames.Description: Players generate words from given letters within a time limit; played in a web browser.

hostGames.Name: Party Animals
hostGames.Description: Party game featuring ragdoll physics, still in development with release date TBD. Playable via official servers or parsec/steam remote play.

hostGames.Name: Use Your Words
hostGames.Description: Players complete sentences and phrases to create humorous or witty responses; host must own the game.

hostGames.Name: Jackbox Party Pack
hostGames.Description: Collection of party games played via a central host device; players use phones or tablets as controllers.

hostGames.Name: Just Act Natural
hostGames.Description: Host must purchase the game and can share with others via screen sharing; includes various minigames.

hostGames.Name: Clue/Cluedo
hostGames.Description: Classic detective game where players must solve a murder mystery; host must own the game.
